name: PLAVE
description: PLAVE is a virtual K-Pop idol group featuring AI-generated avatars with real vocalists, pioneering the future of K-Pop entertainment.

funFacts: Known for his soothing vocal tone
Represents the color blue in the group
His character design was the first revealed
members.bio: Yejun is PLAVE's virtual leader with a warm, caring personality. His soothing vocals and reliable leadership have made him the heart of this innovative virtual group.

funFacts: Known for his dreamy, ethereal appearance
His emotional vocals move fans to tears
members.bio: Noah is PLAVE's visual with ethereal, dreamy features. His emotional vocal delivery and gentle personality have captured hearts in the virtual idol space.
Bamby is PLAVE's energetic main dancer whose playful personality lights up performances. His deer-inspired name reflects his graceful yet powerful dance moves.

funFacts: Known for his soft, gentle image
Has a shy but caring personality
His dancing is elegant and graceful
members.bio: Eunho is PLAVE's gentle soul with elegant dance skills. His soft, shy personality and graceful movements have made him a fan favorite in the virtual idol world.

funFacts: Known for his bright, sunny personality
members.bio: Hamin is PLAVE's bright maknae whose sunshine personality brings joy to the group. His youthful energy and cheerful demeanor make him the mood maker.

seo.title: PLAVE Name Generator | Create Your Virtual K-Pop Name with PLLI
seo.description: Create your PLAVE name with Yejun, Noah, Bamby, Eunho & Hamin! Instant chemistry scores with the virtual idols. Perfect for PLLI fanfiction.
